name: Double 99
description: '''Double 99''', also known as '''R.I.P. Productions''' and '''10Â° Below''', were a [[UK garage]] [[Electronic music duo|duo]] which consisted of members [[Tim Deluxe|Timothy Andrew Liken]] (Tim Deluxe) and Omar Adimora. They are best known for their sole UK chart [[hit single]] "[[RipGroove]]", which reached No. 14 in its second release on the [[UK Singles Chart]] in 1997.
